text: She was one of many stars who attended the super glitzy Versace pre - fall runway show in New York earlier this month. And proving just how much fun she had Kim Kardashian shared a collection of behind the scenes photos from the evening on Monday. The 38 - year - old reality star, dressed in a sparkly pink mini dress appeared to get up to mischief with her husband Kanye West, 41. Giddy : Kim Kardashian has shared a collection of photos from the behind the scenes at the Versace Pre Fall 19 Fashion Show on December 3 The duo looked like giggling teenagers as they ran down a hallway holding hands in one of the images. In another the mother - of - three poked her tongue out as she flashed a cheeky look over her shoulder at the camera
